name: Car Parking - Drive Away 3D
description:
Do you want to leave the parking lot? Please let all cars leave!
How to solve the parking lot problem by moving the vehicles in the correct order.

When all vehicles leave the parking lot, you will get more gold rewards,
The parking lot will be upgraded and expanded to meet more vehicles and challenges.

Challenge your logic and become a new generation of parking master.
Beautiful car, waiting for you to challenge, start now!
